issue.title: www.line.me

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://www.line.me](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.line.me) ### Comment > 開啟軟體後，line的新聞影片無法播放 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/kwrwa95y91scgcs0wssggws8sos0ssgcsfzl68e9s0.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/9t5fwcubc1cscww80okssoo8cg0kosck2icpxostz4.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: www.bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bilibili.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2F) ### Comment > 打开网站并刷新几次就会出现广告 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5muzfgrqycws04okgw88csc8kwk4cwkmygwg1xn8pw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.139 MV2 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Edge Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Other:

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `火绒` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.info/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.139&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=2&browser=edge&filters=2.3.4.11.14.15.18.19.20.21.22.123.208.224&userscripts_enabled=false&browsing_security_enabled=false&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=2880&stealth.block_trackers=true&is_third_party_cookies=true&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.bilibili.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2F) ### Comment > 网站检测到广告拦截插件（有提示）。 > 开启拦截后视频无法播放，关闭拦截后正常。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/gw47463au48wgsos0kg0osc48g0804s8hhqv307gzk.png?nc=1)

Send Do-Not-Track header
